Producer: Bob Yari, Suzanne Todd, Jennifer Todd, Jason Blum, Uma Thurman
Screenwriter: Mimi Hare, Clare Naylor, Bonnie Sikowitz
Production Co: Yari Film Group, Team Todd, Blumhouse
Synopsis: Emma (Uma Thurman), a radio host, is about to be married to Richard (Colin Firth), her perfect match. But right before her wedding, she learns she's already married to Patrick (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a charming but irresponsible fireman. Furthermore, Patrick has a secret: he has arranged this little trick because Emma advised Patrick's ex-fiancee to end their relationship. However, Patrick may find that the trick is on him, for he soon begins to fall in love with his uptight adversary.
Title: The Accidental Husband
